poster: T h e  T ë ë m ó
title: PBE Update PC freeze
body:
On PBE i ran the patcher...all good and fine but when it arrives at 10% my PC just freeze..my PC not the client. I can still log in and look at my runes or unlock champs or skins...but the update stops and my PC too w/o the client.
I tried to reinstall it, run as an admin...

replies.body: Thaaaaat could be a sign of some underlying issue with your pc harddrive possibly. I'd recommend running a checkdisk really quickly as well as using the Windows file checker, but you can also hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where they'll be able to walk you through some other troubleshooting steps and at the very least point you in the right direction!
